name: Chaos Cat (Interstellar Garden, [Tyr|x], Shlof, Shadow DA B0SS, technodragon253)
name_original: Chaos Cat (Interstellar Garden, [Tyr|x], Shlof, Shadow DA B0SS, technodragon253)
description: Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Left click to smash things and right click to dash! Be careful when dashing it takes away Chaos and might end your run! Try to get a personal highscore!
